name: Continuous Creature Corridors
description:
This is yet another another game I made for school with a friend: CR (initials to protect identity).

You are a tourist, heading to your hotel in the middle of the night when you stumble upon a maze.  Naturally, you enter it, and get lost like the dumbass that you are. Will you escape, or succumb to it's horrors?

Controls:

A - Select

B - Backspace

 D-Pad/WASD - Move
